comments.raw_text: When adding Glean to Fx-iOS, I noticed that it was also required to add `.venv` to the .gitignore file.  We should update the docs to include this step [where we recommend adding `/Generated` to the .gitignore file](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/adding-glean-to-your-project.html#adding-new-metrics).
comments.author: tlong@mozilla.com
comments.creator: tlong@mozilla.com
comments.text: When adding Glean to Fx-iOS, I noticed that it was also required to add `.venv` to the .gitignore file.  We should update the docs to include this step [where we recommend adding `/Generated` to the .gitignore file](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/adding-glean-to-your-project.html#adding-new-metrics).
